description: He quits as president to face accusations of torture and enforced disappearances in the war with Serbia.
title: Kosovo leader Thaci in Hague detention over war crimes charges
title_page: Kosovo leader Thaci in Hague detention over war crimes charges - BBC News
maintext: A 2011 Council of Europe report named Mr Thaci as the leader of a criminal offshoot of the KLA Kosovo Liberation Army. At the time he condemned the allegations as baseless. He spent several days with prosecutors in The Hague in July and made it clear at the time that he would stand down if he faced trial.
